Uses of Package
quarks.execution.services

  • Packages that use quarks.execution.services 
    Package Description
    quarks.apps.runtime
    Applications which provide monitoring and failure recovery to other Quarks applications.
    quarks.execution
    Execution of Quarks topologies and graphs.
    quarks.execution.services
    Execution services.
    quarks.metrics
    Metric utility methods, oplets, and reporters which allow an application to expose metric values, for example via JMX.
    quarks.oplet
    Oplets API.
    quarks.providers.direct
    Direct execution of a streaming topology.
    quarks.providers.iot
    Iot provider that allows multiple applications to share an IotDevice.
    quarks.runtime.etiao
    A runtime for executing a Quarks streaming topology, designed as an embeddable library so that it can be executed in a simple Java application.
    quarks.runtime.etiao.graph  
    quarks.runtime.jmxcontrol  
    quarks.runtime.jobregistry  
    quarks.runtime.jsoncontrol
    Control service that takes a Json message and invokes an operation on a control service MBean.
    quarks.topology
    Functional api to build a streaming topology.
  • Classes in quarks.execution.services used by quarks.apps.runtime 
    Class and Description
    ControlService
    Service that provides a control mechanism.
  • Classes in quarks.execution.services used by quarks.execution 
    Class and Description
    ServiceContainer
    Provides a container for services.
